pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, October 4, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Montréal, Quebec

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with dairy industry leaders.

Closed to media.

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of Canadian Heritage and Multiculturalism Pablo Rodriguez will tour Les Films Séville.

Les Films Séville
Third Floor
455 rue St. Antoine Ouest

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:30 a.m.

Burlington, Ontario

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of Innovation, Science and Economic Development Navdeep Bains will tour the MetriCan Stamping Co. manufacturing plant.

MetriCan Stamping Co.
1380 Artisans Court

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity
    • Please note that closed toe shoes are required. Protective eyewear and earplugs will be provided.
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:45 p.m.
